metadata.title: CVE-2020-18651 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in functionID3_Support::ID3v2Frame::getFrameValue in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted audiofile with ID3V2 frame.

criterions.comment: exempi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
